item.title: SharePoint API use in Power BI
item.description:
SharePoint API use in Power BI

Improve performance and gain more control over your SharePoint data in Power BI by using the SharePoint API.
item.content:encoded:
SharePoint API use in Power BI

Improve performance and gain more control over your SharePoint data in Power BI by using the SharePoint API.

item.title: Get SharePoint List Data into Power Query using the Rest API
item.description:
Get SharePoint List Data into Power Query using the Rest API

This video demos the new version of the SharePoint List connector in Power BI, and then shows how to use the SharePoint List REST API to get data even faster…
